item.title: Rocket Lab Reports Next Week: Here’s What Investors Should Know
item.description: Rocket Lab USA is set to report Q2 earnings on August 7 amid strong momentum, with the stock up 760% over the past year and 82% YTD.

item.title: Apple Stock: Big Earnings, Small Move—Time to Buy?
item.description: Apple delivered strong earnings with double-digit growth, but investor skepticism and tariff concerns kept the stock’s post-earnings move in check

item.title: Why State Street's Options Volume Just Sent a Bullish Signal
item.description: An unusual surge in options activity signals strong institutional confidence in State Street's financial health and its shareholder return program.
